nodes.text: A Speaker was the head of one of the Nine Ruling Families' delegations to the Chiss Ascendancy's Syndicure. The Speaker of a family was the second-highest ranking member of the family, behind only the family's Patriarch.
Upon the death of a family Patriarch, one of the roles of a Speaker was choosing a successor Patriarch along with the various family Patriels.

Some families, such as the Mitth, had a secret rank known as Syndic Prime intermediate in level between Speaker and the other Syndics. When Syndic Primes were used, they were considered the head Syndic of that family.
